recipes.name: Lasagna
instructions: 1. Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
3. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Stir in the tomato sauce and heat through.
5. In a separate bowl, mix together the cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, basil, salt, and pepper.
6. In a 9x13 inch baking dish, layer the noodles, meat sauce, and cheese mixture, in that order. Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used up, ending with a layer of cheese on top.
7. Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
7. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
8. Using a cookie scoop or spoon, drop rounded balls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving about 2 inches (5 cm) between each cookie.
9. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
